welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Satsuma, Japan! Known for its rich history, charming streets, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to immerse yourself in the beauty of our city and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Kagoshima Airport handles all domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves international flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
